## UseCounterResult interface

Contains a counter and some functions to update it.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface UseCounterResult 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [count](./hooks.usecounterresult.count.md) |  | number | Current counter number. |
|  [decrement](./hooks.usecounterresult.decrement.md) |  | () =&gt; void | Decrement counter by 1. |
|  [decrementBy](./hooks.usecounterresult.decrementby.md) |  | (value: number) =&gt; void | Decrement counter by a specific value. |
|  [increment](./hooks.usecounterresult.increment.md) |  | () =&gt; void | Increment counter by 1. |
|  [incrementBy](./hooks.usecounterresult.incrementby.md) |  | (value: number) =&gt; void | Increment counter by a specific value. |
|  [reset](./hooks.usecounterresult.reset.md) |  | () =&gt; void | Reset counter to initial value. |
|  [resetToZero](./hooks.usecounterresult.resettozero.md) |  | () =&gt; void | Reset counter to 0. |
|  [setCount](./hooks.usecounterresult.setcount.md) |  | (value: number) =&gt; void | Set counter to an arbitrary value. |
